title: Font Bros
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011125855/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Font Retailers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011125855/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font%20Retailers) : Font Bros**

Launched August 2006, Font Bros Typography Supply Company is the brain-child of [Stuart Sandler](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011125855/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Stuart%20Sandler) and [Mike Ibach](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011125855/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Mike%20Ibach). As a font retailer of display typography, Font Bros offers selections from other foundries including: [Astigmatic One Eye](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011125855/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Astigmatic%20One%20Eye), [ByAndreas](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011125855/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ByAndreas), [Mark Simonson Studio](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011125855/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Mark%20Simonson%20Studio), [Alphabet Soup](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011125855/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Alphabet%20Soup), [Fonthead Design](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011125855/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Fonthead%20Design), [CBdO](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011125855/http:/typophile.com/wiki/CBdO), [Sideshow](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011125855/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Sideshow), [Wilton Type](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011125855/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Wilton%20Type), [Blue Vinyl](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011125855/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Blue%20Vinyl), [Font-O-Ville](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011125855/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font-O-Ville), [Outside-The-Line](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011125855/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Outside-The-Line), and [Sparkytype](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011125855/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Sparkytype). Font Bros is also the exclusive retailer of the ever-popular [Fontalicious](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011125855/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Fontalicious) fonts which have been re-mastered for release on the site.

URL: [www.fontbros.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011125855/http:/www.fontbros.com/ "www.fontbros.com")
